title: Intermittent theta-burst stimulation in aphasia caused by right side cerebral lesions after stroke: A case report with 2-year follow-up
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Haozheng Li, Shunjuan Fan, Yi Wu, Dongxiang Fang, Ruiping Hu, Rongrong Lu
